output:
Innocence has left me
Now I don't talk anymore
Something in their eyes
And I know I've been here before
You'll never have to worry
Never wander anywhere
I feel it's been a long time
Such a long time I knew before
Since I felt like that
Now you long to dream
Of the life that you knew
Steal yourself this day
For the clouds have kept it from view
You'll never have to worry
Never wander anywhere
I feel it's been a long time
Such a long time I knew before
Since I felt like that
